abilities.description: When Kuma strikes someone with his paw pads, they are sent flying through the air for three days and three nights to a destination only Kuma knows. The victims travel in a bubble-like sphere during their journey.
abilities.limitations: Only Kuma knows where the victims will land. The journey takes exactly three days.
abilities.significance: This ability is used to scatter the entire Straw Hat crew across the world in episode 405, marking a turning point in the series.

keyMoments.title: Sentomaru Explains Teleportation Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru reveals that when Kuma strikes someone with his paws, they fly for three days to destinations only Kuma knows.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial information about how the Straw Hats were separated and confirms they are alive.

keyMoments.title: All Straw Hats Teleported
keyMoments.description: Kuma uses his Devil Fruit power to send all nine Straw Hat crew members to different locations across the world.
keyMoments.significance: The most impactful use of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi in the series, completely changing the story's trajectory.

trivia: The Nikyu Nikyu no Mi's teleportation ability is central to the Sabaody Archipelago Arc's conclusion and sets up the two-year timeskip.
The three-day flight time is a specific detail revealed in this episode.
The bubble-like effect when crew members disappear mirrors the soap bubbles of Sabaody Archipelago.
